meanings.definition: To label again with a different name or description.
meanings.sent1: She relabelled the jars with new names for better organization.
meanings.sent2: After the mix-up, the products were relabelled with the correct information.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous elf relabelled all the candy jars to confuse the kids.
meanings.sent4: The artist relabelled her paintings to give them a fresh perspective.
meanings.sent5: The detective relabelled the evidence to uncover the truth.
